Fury of the North.name: Fury of the North
Fury of the North.blurb: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.
Fury of the North.description: Frost Armor: Sejuani receives  Frost Armor if she hasn't taken damage from large monsters and enemy champions in the last 12 seconds, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage.
Fury of the North.description2: Frost Armor engulfs  Bristle in True Ice, becoming immune to  slows and gains  10 (+ 50% bonus armor) bonus armor and  10 (+ 50% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance.
Fury of the North.description3: Icebreaker: Enemies  stunned by Sejuani are Frozen. Sejuani's basic attacks and abilities against Frozen enemies consume the effect to deal 10% of their maximum health  bonus magic damage, capped to 300 against epic monsters.

Arctic Assault.name: Arctic Assault
Arctic Assault.blurb: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
Arctic Assault.description: Active: Sejuani signals  Bristle to  dash in the target direction, dealing magic damage and  knocking up all enemies hit for 0.5 seconds. The charge will prematurely end upon colliding with an enemy champion.
Arctic Assault.notes:
* Champions will slightly be  knocked back, while minions and monsters will instead be slightly  pulled for a fixed distance.
 Arctic Assault cannot  knock enemies over terrain.

Winter's Wrath.name: Winter's Wrath
Winter's Wrath.blurb: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
Winter's Wrath.description: Active: After a 0.25-seconds delay, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction, dealing  physical damage to all enemies hit and  knocking back minions and monsters.
Winter's Wrath.leveling:
Physical Damage:
20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40 (+ 20% AP) (+ 2% of her maximum health)
Winter's Wrath.description2: She then lashes out with her flail after 0.75 seconds in a straight line in the same direction, dealing additional physical damage and  slowing all enemies hit by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
Winter's Wrath.leveling2:
Physical Damage:
30 / 70 / 110 / 150 / 190 (+ 60% AP) (+ 5.25% of her maximum health)
Total Damage:
50 / 95 / 140 / 185 / 230 (+ 80% AP) (+ 7.25% of her maximum health)
Winter's Wrath.description3: Sejuani can move freely during Winter's Wrath. Both swings will strike in the cast direction, but their hitboxes follow Sejuani's movement.
Winter's Wrath.notes:
*  Spell shields will block only a single instance of damage - either the swing or the lash.
 The ability's cooldown starts after both flail attacks are completed.

Permafrost.name: Permafrost
Permafrost.blurb: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
Permafrost.description: Passive:  Winter's Wrath and both Sejuani's and nearby allied  melee champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions, epic, large and medium monsters, super minions and siege minions for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.
Permafrost.description2: Active: If the targeted enemy has 4 stacks of Frost, Sejuani consumes all stacks to deal magic damage,  knock them down, and  stun them for 1 second.
Permafrost.description3: Enemy champions  stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for 10 / 9 / 8 (based on level) seconds.
Permafrost.description4: Permafrost resets Sejuani's basic attack timer.

Glacial Prison.name: Glacial Prison
Glacial Prison.blurb: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
Glacial Prison.description: Active: Sejuani throws a True Ice bola in the target direction, stopping at the first enemy champion hit, dealing magic damage,  knocking them down, and  stunning them for 1 second.
Glacial Prison.description2: The bola deals increased damage,  stuns for 1.5 seconds and shatters upon reaching maximum range or upon colliding with a unit beyond 400 range, creating a storm for 2 seconds that  slows enemies by 30%.
Glacial Prison.description3: At the end of the duration the storm shatters the ground, dealing the same damage and  slowing enemies by 80% for 1 second.
Glacial Prison.description4: The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
Glacial Prison.notes:
* Glacial Prison affects minions only if they are within detonation radius.
  Spell shields will block only a single instance of damage.
 The  stun will apply  single target spell effect, while the storm will apply  area of effect spell damage.
 The True Ice bola is always thrown at maximum range.
 The True Ice bola does not collide with terrain.
 The True Ice bola applies the freeze immunity of  Permafrost when  stunning a champion.
